Browse the source code of netbsd/external/lgpl3/mpc/dist/src/atan.c

1/* mpc_atan -- arctangent of a complex number.
2
3Copyright (C) 2009, 2010, 2011, 2012, 2013, 2017 INRIA
4
5This file is part of GNU MPC.
6
7GNU MPC is free software; you can redistribute it and/or modify it under
8the terms of the GNU Lesser General Public License as published by the
9Free Software Foundation; either version 3 of the License, or (at your
10option) any later version.
11
12GNU MPC is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT ANY
13WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS
14FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the GNU Lesser General Public License for
15more details.
16
17You should have received a copy of the GNU Lesser General Public License
18along with this program. If not, see http://www.gnu.org/licenses/ .
19*/

21#include <stdio.h>
22#include "mpc-impl.h"
23
24/* set rop to
25 -pi/2 if s < 0
26 +pi/2 else
27 rounded in the direction rnd
28*/
29int
30set_pi_over_2 (mpfr_ptr rop, int s, mpfr_rnd_t rnd)
31{
32 int inex;
33
34 inex = mpfr_const_pi (rop, s < 0 ? INV_RND (rnd) : rnd);
35 mpfr_div_2ui (rop, rop, 1, MPFR_RNDN);
36 if (s < 0)
37 {
38 inex = -inex;
39 mpfr_neg (rop, rop, MPFR_RNDN);
40 }
41
42 return inex;
43}
44
45int
46mpc_atan (mpc_ptr rop, mpc_srcptr op, mpc_rnd_t rnd)
47{
48 int s_re;
49 int s_im;
50 int inex_re;
51 int inex_im;
52 int inex;
53
54 inex_re = 0;
55 inex_im = 0;
56 s_re = mpfr_signbit (mpc_realref (op));
57 s_im = mpfr_signbit (mpc_imagref (op));
58
59 /* special values */
60 if (mpfr_nan_p (mpc_realref (op)) || mpfr_nan_p (mpc_imagref (op)))
61 {
62 if (mpfr_nan_p (mpc_realref (op)))
63 {
64 mpfr_set_nan (mpc_realref (rop));
65 if (mpfr_zero_p (mpc_imagref (op)) || mpfr_inf_p (mpc_imagref (op)))
66 {
67 mpfr_set_ui (mpc_imagref (rop), 0, MPFR_RNDN);
68 if (s_im)
69 mpc_conj (rop, rop, MPC_RNDNN);
70 }
71 else
72 mpfr_set_nan (mpc_imagref (rop));
73 }
74 else
75 {
76 if (mpfr_inf_p (mpc_realref (op)))
77 {
78 inex_re = set_pi_over_2 (mpc_realref (rop), -s_re, MPC_RND_RE (rnd));
79 mpfr_set_ui (mpc_imagref (rop), 0, MPFR_RNDN);
80 }
81 else
82 {
83 mpfr_set_nan (mpc_realref (rop));
84 mpfr_set_nan (mpc_imagref (rop));
85 }
86 }
87 return MPC_INEX (inex_re, 0);
88 }
89
90 if (mpfr_inf_p (mpc_realref (op)) || mpfr_inf_p (mpc_imagref (op)))
91 {
92 inex_re = set_pi_over_2 (mpc_realref (rop), -s_re, MPC_RND_RE (rnd));
93
94 mpfr_set_ui (mpc_imagref (rop), 0, MPFR_RNDN);
95 if (s_im)
96 mpc_conj (rop, rop, MPFR_RNDN);
97
98 return MPC_INEX (inex_re, 0);
99 }
100
101 /* pure real argument */
102 if (mpfr_zero_p (mpc_imagref (op)))
103 {
104 inex_re = mpfr_atan (mpc_realref (rop), mpc_realref (op), MPC_RND_RE (rnd));
105
106 mpfr_set_ui (mpc_imagref (rop), 0, MPFR_RNDN);
107 if (s_im)
108 mpc_conj (rop, rop, MPFR_RNDN);
109
110 return MPC_INEX (inex_re, 0);
111 }
112
113 /* pure imaginary argument */
114 if (mpfr_zero_p (mpc_realref (op)))
115 {
116 int cmp_1;
117
118 if (s_im)
119 cmp_1 = -mpfr_cmp_si (mpc_imagref (op), -1);
120 else
121 cmp_1 = mpfr_cmp_ui (mpc_imagref (op), +1);
122
123 if (cmp_1 < 0)
124 {
125 /* atan(+0+iy) = +0 +i*atanh(y), if |y| < 1
126 atan(-0+iy) = -0 +i*atanh(y), if |y| < 1 */
127
128 mpfr_set_ui (mpc_realref (rop), 0, MPFR_RNDN);
129 if (s_re)
130 mpfr_neg (mpc_realref (rop), mpc_realref (rop), MPFR_RNDN);
131
132 inex_im = mpfr_atanh (mpc_imagref (rop), mpc_imagref (op), MPC_RND_IM (rnd));
133 }
134 else if (cmp_1 == 0)
135 {
136 /* atan(+/-0 +i) = +/-0 +i*inf
137 atan(+/-0 -i) = +/-0 -i*inf */
138 mpfr_set_zero (mpc_realref (rop), s_re ? -1 : +1);
139 mpfr_set_inf (mpc_imagref (rop), s_im ? -1 : +1);
140 }
141 else
142 {
143 /* atan(+0+iy) = +pi/2 +i*atanh(1/y), if |y| > 1
144 atan(-0+iy) = -pi/2 +i*atanh(1/y), if |y| > 1 */
145 mpfr_rnd_t rnd_im, rnd_away;
146 mpfr_t y, z;
147 mpfr_prec_t p, p_im;
148 int ok;
149
150 rnd_im = MPC_RND_IM (rnd);
151 mpfr_init (y);
152 mpfr_init (z);
153 p_im = mpfr_get_prec (mpc_imagref (rop));
154 p = p_im;
155
156 /* a = o(1/y) with error(a) < ulp(a), rounded away
157 b = o(atanh(a)) with error(b) < ulp(b) + 1/|a^2-1|*ulp(a),
158 since if a = 1/y + eps, then atanh(a) = atanh(1/y) + eps * atanh'(t)
159 with t in (1/y, a). Since a is rounded away, we have 1/y <= a <= 1
160 if y > 1, and -1 <= a <= 1/y if y < -1, thus |atanh'(t)| =
161 1/|t^2-1| <= 1/|a^2-1|.
162
163 We round atanh(1/y) away from 0.
164 */
165 do
166 {
167 mpfr_exp_t err, exp_a;
168
169 p += mpc_ceil_log2 (p) + 2;
170 mpfr_set_prec (y, p);
171 mpfr_set_prec (z, p);
172 rnd_away = s_im == 0 ? MPFR_RNDU : MPFR_RNDD;
173 inex_im = mpfr_ui_div (y, 1, mpc_imagref (op), rnd_away);
174 exp_a = mpfr_get_exp (y);
175 /* FIXME: should we consider the case with unreasonably huge
176 precision prec(y)>3*exp_min, where atanh(1/Im(op)) could be
177 representable while 1/Im(op) underflows ?
178 This corresponds to |y| = 0.5*2^emin, in which case the
179 result may be wrong. */
180
181 /* We would like to compute a rounded-up error bound 1/|a^2-1|,
182 so we need to round down |a^2-1|, which means rounding up
183 a^2 since |a|<1. */
184 mpfr_sqr (z, y, MPFR_RNDU);
185 /* since |y| > 1, we should have |a| <= 1, thus a^2 <= 1 */
186 MPC_ASSERT(mpfr_cmp_ui (z, 1) <= 0);
187 /* in case z=1, we should try again with more precision */
188 if (mpfr_cmp_ui (z, 1) == 0)
189 continue;
190 /* now z < 1 */
191 mpfr_ui_sub (z, 1, z, MPFR_RNDZ);
192
193 /* atanh cannot underflow: |atanh(x)| > |x| for |x| < 1 */
194 inex_im |= mpfr_atanh (y, y, rnd_away);
195
196 /* the error is now bounded by ulp(b) + 1/z*ulp(a), thus
197 ulp(b) + 2^(exp(a) - exp(b) + 1 - exp(z)) * ulp(b) */
198 err = exp_a - mpfr_get_exp (y) + 1 - mpfr_get_exp (z);
199 if (err >= 0) /* 1 + 2^err <= 2^(err+1) */
200 err = err + 1;
201 else
202 err = 1; /* 1 + 2^err <= 2^1 */
203
204 /* the error is bounded by 2^err ulps */
205
206 ok = inex_im == 0
207 || mpfr_can_round (y, p - err, rnd_away, MPFR_RNDZ,
208 p_im + (rnd_im == MPFR_RNDN));
209 } while (ok == 0);
210
211 inex_re = set_pi_over_2 (mpc_realref (rop), -s_re, MPC_RND_RE (rnd));
212 inex_im = mpfr_set (mpc_imagref (rop), y, rnd_im);
213 mpfr_clear (y);
214 mpfr_clear (z);
215 }
216 return MPC_INEX (inex_re, inex_im);
217 }
218
219 /* regular number argument */
220 {
221 mpfr_t a, b, x, y;
222 mpfr_prec_t prec, p;
223 mpfr_exp_t err, expo;
224 int ok = 0;
225 mpfr_t minus_op_re;
226 mpfr_exp_t op_re_exp, op_im_exp;
227 mpfr_rnd_t rnd1, rnd2;
228
229 mpfr_inits2 (MPFR_PREC_MIN, a, b, x, y, (mpfr_ptr) 0);
230
231 /* real part: Re(arctan(x+i*y)) = [arctan2(x,1-y) - arctan2(-x,1+y)]/2 */
232 minus_op_re[0] = mpc_realref (op)[0];
233 MPFR_CHANGE_SIGN (minus_op_re);
234 op_re_exp = mpfr_get_exp (mpc_realref (op));
235 op_im_exp = mpfr_get_exp (mpc_imagref (op));
236
237 prec = mpfr_get_prec (mpc_realref (rop)); /* result precision */
238
239 /* a = o(1-y) error(a) < 1 ulp(a)
240 b = o(atan2(x,a)) error(b) < [1+2^{3+Exp(x)-Exp(a)-Exp(b)}] ulp(b)
241 = kb ulp(b)
242 c = o(1+y) error(c) < 1 ulp(c)
243 d = o(atan2(-x,c)) error(d) < [1+2^{3+Exp(x)-Exp(c)-Exp(d)}] ulp(d)
244 = kd ulp(d)
245 e = o(b - d) error(e) < [1 + kb*2^{Exp(b}-Exp(e)}
246 + kd*2^{Exp(d)-Exp(e)}] ulp(e)
247 error(e) < [1 + 2^{4+Exp(x)-Exp(a)-Exp(e)}
248 + 2^{4+Exp(x)-Exp(c)-Exp(e)}] ulp(e)
249 because |atan(u)| < |u|
250 < [1 + 2^{5+Exp(x)-min(Exp(a),Exp(c))
251 -Exp(e)}] ulp(e)
252 f = e/2 exact
253 */
254
255 /* p: working precision */
256 p = (op_im_exp > 0 || prec > SAFE_ABS (mpfr_prec_t, op_im_exp)) ? prec
257 : (prec - op_im_exp);
258 rnd1 = mpfr_sgn (mpc_realref (op)) > 0 ? MPFR_RNDD : MPFR_RNDU;
259 rnd2 = mpfr_sgn (mpc_realref (op)) < 0 ? MPFR_RNDU : MPFR_RNDD;
260
261 do
262 {
263 p += mpc_ceil_log2 (p) + 2;
264 mpfr_set_prec (a, p);
265 mpfr_set_prec (b, p);
266 mpfr_set_prec (x, p);
267
268 /* x = upper bound for atan (x/(1-y)). Since atan is increasing, we
269 need an upper bound on x/(1-y), i.e., a lower bound on 1-y for
270 x positive, and an upper bound on 1-y for x negative */
271 mpfr_ui_sub (a, 1, mpc_imagref (op), rnd1);
272 if (mpfr_sgn (a) == 0) /* y is near 1, thus 1+y is near 2, and
273 expo will be 1 or 2 below */
274 {
275 MPC_ASSERT (mpfr_cmp_ui (mpc_imagref(op), 1) == 0);
276 /* check for intermediate underflow */
277 err = 2; /* ensures err will be expo below */
278 }
279 else
280 err = mpfr_get_exp (a); /* err = Exp(a) with the notations above */
281 mpfr_atan2 (x, mpc_realref (op), a, MPFR_RNDU);
282
283 /* b = lower bound for atan (-x/(1+y)): for x negative, we need a
284 lower bound on -x/(1+y), i.e., an upper bound on 1+y */
285 mpfr_add_ui (a, mpc_imagref(op), 1, rnd2);
286 /* if a is exactly zero, i.e., Im(op) = -1, then the error on a is 0,
287 and we can simply ignore the terms involving Exp(a) in the error */
288 if (mpfr_sgn (a) == 0)
289 {
290 MPC_ASSERT (mpfr_cmp_si (mpc_imagref(op), -1) == 0);
291 /* check for intermediate underflow */
292 expo = err; /* will leave err unchanged below */
293 }
294 else
295 expo = mpfr_get_exp (a); /* expo = Exp(c) with the notations above */
296 mpfr_atan2 (b, minus_op_re, a, MPFR_RNDD);
297
298 err = err < expo ? err : expo; /* err = min(Exp(a),Exp(c)) */
299 mpfr_sub (x, x, b, MPFR_RNDU);
300
301 err = 5 + op_re_exp - err - mpfr_get_exp (x);
302 /* error is bounded by [1 + 2^err] ulp(e) */
303 err = err < 0 ? 1 : err + 1;
304
305 mpfr_div_2ui (x, x, 1, MPFR_RNDU);
306
307 /* Note: using RND2=RNDD guarantees that if x is exactly representable
308 on prec + ... bits, mpfr_can_round will return 0 */
309 ok = mpfr_can_round (x, p - err, MPFR_RNDU, MPFR_RNDD,
310 prec + (MPC_RND_RE (rnd) == MPFR_RNDN));
311 } while (ok == 0);
312
313 /* Imaginary part
314 Im(atan(x+I*y)) = 1/4 * [log(x^2+(1+y)^2) - log (x^2 +(1-y)^2)] */
315 prec = mpfr_get_prec (mpc_imagref (rop)); /* result precision */
316
317 /* a = o(1+y) error(a) < 1 ulp(a)
318 b = o(a^2) error(b) < 5 ulp(b)
319 c = o(x^2) error(c) < 1 ulp(c)
320 d = o(b+c) error(d) < 7 ulp(d)
321 e = o(log(d)) error(e) < [1 + 7*2^{2-Exp(e)}] ulp(e) = ke ulp(e)
322 f = o(1-y) error(f) < 1 ulp(f)
323 g = o(f^2) error(g) < 5 ulp(g)
324 h = o(c+f) error(h) < 7 ulp(h)
325 i = o(log(h)) error(i) < [1 + 7*2^{2-Exp(i)}] ulp(i) = ki ulp(i)
326 j = o(e-i) error(j) < [1 + ke*2^{Exp(e)-Exp(j)}
327 + ki*2^{Exp(i)-Exp(j)}] ulp(j)
328 error(j) < [1 + 2^{Exp(e)-Exp(j)} + 2^{Exp(i)-Exp(j)}
329 + 7*2^{3-Exp(j)}] ulp(j)
330 < [1 + 2^{max(Exp(e),Exp(i))-Exp(j)+1}
331 + 7*2^{3-Exp(j)}] ulp(j)
332 k = j/4 exact
333 */
334 err = 2;
335 p = prec; /* working precision */
336
337 do
338 {
339 p += mpc_ceil_log2 (p) + err;
340 mpfr_set_prec (a, p);
341 mpfr_set_prec (b, p);
342 mpfr_set_prec (y, p);
343
344 /* a = upper bound for log(x^2 + (1+y)^2) */
345 mpfr_add_ui (a, mpc_imagref (op), 1, MPFR_RNDA);
346 mpfr_sqr (a, a, MPFR_RNDU);
347 mpfr_sqr (y, mpc_realref (op), MPFR_RNDU);
348 mpfr_add (a, a, y, MPFR_RNDU);
349 mpfr_log (a, a, MPFR_RNDU);
350
351 /* b = lower bound for log(x^2 + (1-y)^2) */
352 mpfr_ui_sub (b, 1, mpc_imagref (op), MPFR_RNDZ); /* round to zero */
353 mpfr_sqr (b, b, MPFR_RNDZ);
354 /* we could write mpfr_sqr (y, mpc_realref (op), MPFR_RNDZ) but it is
355 more efficient to reuse the value of y (x^2) above and subtract
356 one ulp */
357 mpfr_nextbelow (y);
358 mpfr_add (b, b, y, MPFR_RNDZ);
359 mpfr_log (b, b, MPFR_RNDZ);
360
361 mpfr_sub (y, a, b, MPFR_RNDU);
362
363 if (mpfr_zero_p (y))
364 /* FIXME: happens when x and y have very different magnitudes;
365 could be handled more efficiently */
366 ok = 0;
367 else
368 {
369 expo = MPC_MAX (mpfr_get_exp (a), mpfr_get_exp (b));
370 expo = expo - mpfr_get_exp (y) + 1;
371 err = 3 - mpfr_get_exp (y);
372 /* error(j) <= [1 + 2^expo + 7*2^err] ulp(j) */
373 if (expo <= err) /* error(j) <= [1 + 2^{err+1}] ulp(j) */
374 err = (err < 0) ? 1 : err + 2;
375 else
376 err = (expo < 0) ? 1 : expo + 2;
377
378 mpfr_div_2ui (y, y, 2, MPFR_RNDN);
379 MPC_ASSERT (!mpfr_zero_p (y));
380 /* FIXME: underflow. Since the main term of the Taylor series
381 in y=0 is 1/(x^2+1) * y, this means that y is very small
382 and/or x very large; but then the mpfr_zero_p (y) above
383 should be true. This needs a proof, or better yet,
384 special code. */
385
386 ok = mpfr_can_round (y, p - err, MPFR_RNDU, MPFR_RNDD,
387 prec + (MPC_RND_IM (rnd) == MPFR_RNDN));
388 }
389 } while (ok == 0);
390
391 inex = mpc_set_fr_fr (rop, x, y, rnd);
392
393 mpfr_clears (a, b, x, y, (mpfr_ptr) 0);
394 return inex;
395 }
396}
